imdb.plot outline: The story of Zaca and Andre. Two brazilian immigrants from complete opposite backgrounds that meet by chance in London. One is a playboy, a bon vivant student and the other one is a hard working illegal immigrant. After a series of unfortunate events, they must help each other to survive.
imdb.title: Brazukas
plot: A comedy set in the world of Brazilian motorcycle couriers living in London.::Anonymous

The story of Zaca and Andre. Two brazilian immigrants from complete opposite backgrounds that meet by chance in London. One is a playboy, a bon vivant student and the other one is a hard working illegal immigrant. After a series of unfortunate events, they must help each other to survive.::Anonymous
